page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KAREN
page.content: Every morning except for Saturdays and Sundays I get up at 8.00 in the morning, go downstairs, eat my break- fast, put the dishes in the sink, then go to the bathroom, brush my teeth. Once dressed, watch TV AM until 8.25, get my coat and bag then off to school knocking for Sandra on the way. At school meet our other friends Sonia, Kelly and Ceon. At 8.55 the bell goes, we go into class, then to assembly. Returning to class for the first lesson, at 10.45 the bell goes for play, at 11.00 the next lesson starts. Lunch is from 12.00-1.15. After lunch we continue a work theme with a break at 2.30-2.45. Sometimes a story for the last 30 minutes and bell goes at 3.45 for home. I walk home from school with Sandra, have my dinner, watch TV till 6.30 go out to play, come in at 8.30, then watch TV, and up to bed.
